sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PYYT0304 ( SYSTEMKEY , DPOB_CD , PYYT_YR_MNTH , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , HAN_NM , RESN_REGN_NUM , DEPT_CD , BUSIN_CD , TYP_OCCU_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , ODTY_CD , PYSP_CD , LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD , FRST_EMYMT_DT , EMYMT_BGNN_DT , EMYMT_END_DT , HDOFC_DIV_CD , RETRY_DT , PYYT_PYMT_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_EXTPY_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_TXTN_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_FREE_DTY_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_DDUC_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_TX_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_SEVE_PAY_PYMT_YN , PYYT_PERN_PYMT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #systemkey# , #dpobCd# , #pyytYrMnth# , #payrMangDeptCd# , #emymtDivCd# , #hanNm# , #resnRegnNum# , #deptCd# , #businCd# , #typOccuCd# , #dtilOccuInttnCd# , #odtyCd# , #pyspCd# , #logSvcYrNumCd# , #logSvcMnthIcmCd# , #frstEmymtDt# , #emymtBgnnDt# , #emymtEndDt# , #hdofcDivCd# , #retryDt# , #pyytPymtTotAmnt# , #pyytExtpyTotAmnt# , #pyytTxtnTotAmnt# , #pyytFreeDtyTotAmnt# , #pyytDducTotAmnt# , #pyytTxTotAmnt# , #pyytSevePayPymtYn# , #pyytPernPymtSum# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )

INSERT INTO PYYT0304 ( SYSTEMKEY , DPOB_CD , PYYT_YR_MNTH , HAN_NM , RESN_REGN_NUM , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , DEPT_CD , BUSIN_CD , TYP_OCCU_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , ODTY_CD , PYSP_CD , LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD , FRST_EMYMT_DT , EMYMT_BGNN_DT , EMYMT_END_DT , HDOFC_DIV_CD , RETRY_DT , PYYT_PYMT_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_EXTPY_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_TXTN_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_FREE_DTY_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_DDUC_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_TX_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_PERN_PYMT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR )
SELECT #systemkey# , #dpobCd# , #pyytYrMnth# , #hanNm# , (SELECT RESN_REGN_NUM FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#) , ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD = 'A0020020' THEN ( SELECT PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD FROM BASS0400 WHERE DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND DEPT_CD = AA.DEPT_CD ) ELSE (SELECT PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD FROM BASS0360 WHERE DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD AND TYP_OCCU_CD = AA.TYP_OCCU_CD AND DEPT_CD = AA.DEPT_CD) END ) FROM PSNL0110 AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY =#systemkey# AND AA.EMYMT_BGNN_DT = ( SELECT MAX(EMYMT_BGNN_DT) FROM PSNL0110 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND BB.EMYMT_TYP_CD NOT IN ('A0420040', 'A0420990', 'A0420080') AND NVL(BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) <= LAST_DAY (TO_DATE(#pyytYrMnth#, 'YYYYMM') + 1 / 24 ) ) )AS PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , DEPT_CD , BUSIN_CD , TYP_OCCU_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , ODTY_CD , ( SELECT PYSP_CD FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#) , DUTY_YR_NUM , DUTY_MNTH_ICM , (SELECT FRST_EMYMT_DT FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#) , EMYMT_BGNN_DT , EMYMT_END_DT , ( SELECT HDOFC_CODTN_CD FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#) , ( SELECT RETRY_DT FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#) , ( SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080010','B0080020') AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth# ) , ( SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080020') AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth# ) , ( SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYDD_TXTN_AMNT), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080010', 'B0080020') AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth# ) , ( SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYDD_FREE_DTY_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080010', 'B0080020') AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth# ) , ( SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080030') AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth# ) , ( SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYDD_FREE_DTY_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080040') AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth# ) , NVL( ( SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080010','B0080020')AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth# ) - ( SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080020') AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth#) - ( SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYDD_FREE_DTY_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080040') AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth#) , 0) , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM PSNL0110 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND EMYMT_BGNN_DT = ( SELECT MAX(BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT) FROM PSNL0110 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND BB.EMYMT_TYP_CD NOT IN ('A0420040', 'A0420990', 'A0420080') AND NVL(BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) <= LAST_DAY (TO_DATE(#pyytYrMnth#, 'YYYYMM') + 1 / 24 ) )

UPDATE PYYT0304 TA01 SET (PYYT_PYMT_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_EXTPY_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_TXTN_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_FREE_DTY_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_DDUC_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_TX_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_PERN_PYMT_SUM , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) = (SELECT AA.PYYT_PYMT_TOT_AMNT , AA.PYYT_EXTPY_TOT_AMNT , AA.PYYT_TXTN_TOT_AMNT , AA.PYYT_FREE_DTY_TOT_AMNT , AA.PYYT_DDUC_TOT_AMNT , AA.PYYT_TX_TOT_AMNT , (AA.PYYT_PYMT_TOT_AMNT - AA.PYYT_DDUC_TOT_AMNT - AA.PYYT_TX_TOT_AMNT) AS PYYT_PERN_PYMT_SUM , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM (SELECT (SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080010','B0080020') AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth# )AS PYYT_PYMT_TOT_AMNT ,(SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080020') AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth# )AS PYYT_EXTPY_TOT_AMNT , (SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYDD_TXTN_AMNT), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080010', 'B0080020') AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth# )AS PYYT_TXTN_TOT_AMNT , (SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYDD_FREE_DTY_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080010', 'B0080020') AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth# )AS PYYT_FREE_DTY_TOT_AMNT
, (SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080030') AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth# )AS PYYT_DDUC_TOT_AMNT , (SELECT NVL (SUM (PYYT_PYDD_FREE_DTY_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD IN ('B0080040') AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth# )AS PYYT_TX_TOT_AMNT , 0 FROM DUAL ) AA ) WHERE TA01.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth#

UPDATE PYYT0304 SET SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , PYYT_YR_MNTH=#pyytYrMnth# , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd# , EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# , HAN_NM=#hanNm# , RESN_REGN_NUM=#resnRegnNum# , DEPT_CD=#deptCd# , BUSIN_CD=#businCd# , TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd# , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd# , ODTY_CD=#odtyCd# , PYSP_CD=#pyspCd# , LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD=#logSvcYrNumCd# , LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD=#logSvcMnthIcmCd# , FRST_EMYMT_DT=#frstEmymtDt# , EMYMT_BGNN_DT=#emymtBgnnDt# , EMYMT_END_DT=#emymtEndDt# , HDOFC_DIV_CD=#hdofcDivCd# , RETRY_DT=#retryDt# , PYYT_PYMT_TOT_AMNT=#pyytPymtTotAmnt# , PYYT_EXTPY_TOT_AMNT=#pyytExtpyTotAmnt# , PYYT_TXTN_TOT_AMNT=#pyytTxtnTotAmnt# , PYYT_FREE_DTY_TOT_AMNT=#pyytFreeDtyTotAmnt# , PYYT_DDUC_TOT_AMNT=#pyytDducTotAmnt# , PYYT_TX_TOT_AMNT=#pyytTxTotAmnt# , PYYT_SEVE_PAY_PYMT_YN=#pyytSevePayPymtYn# , PYYT_PERN_PYMT_SUM=#pyytPernPymtSum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYYT_YR_MNTH=#pyytYrMnth#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PYYT0304 WHERE SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYYT_YR_MNTH=#pyytYrMnth#
sqlMap.select: SELECT SYSTEMKEY , DPOB_CD , PYYT_YR_MNTH , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , HAN_NM , RESN_REGN_NUM , DEPT_CD , BUSIN_CD , TYP_OCCU_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , ODTY_CD , PYSP_CD , LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD , FRST_EMYMT_DT , EMYMT_BGNN_DT , EMYMT_END_DT , HDOFC_DIV_CD , RETRY_DT , PYYT_PYMT_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_EXTPY_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_TXTN_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_FREE_DTY_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_DDUC_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_TX_TOT_AMNT , PYYT_SEVE_PAY_PYMT_YN , PYYT_PERN_PYMT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PYYT0304 WHERE SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYYT_YR_MNTH=#pyytYrMnth#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.DPOB_CD , AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH , AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD, AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM , AA.HAN_NM , AA.RESN_REGN_NUM , AA.DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.DEPT_CD,'3') AS DEPT_NM , AA.BUSIN_CD , DECODE(AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD, 'A0020020', fcBass0500CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,SUBSTR(AA.EMYMT_BGNN_DT,1,4),DEPT_CD, BUSIN_CD), fcBassEx0350CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.TYP_OCCU_CD,AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) )AS BUSIN_NM , AA.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.TYP_OCCU_CD,AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , AA.ODTY_CD , AA.PYSP_CD , AA.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD, AA.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_NM , AA.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD, AA.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_NM , AA.FRST_EMYMT_DT , AA.EMYMT_BGNN_DT , AA.EMYMT_END_DT , AA.HDOFC_DIV_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD, AA.HDOFC_DIV_CD) AS HDOFC_DIV_NM , AA.RETRY_DT , AA.PYYT_PYMT_TOT_AMNT , AA.PYYT_EXTPY_TOT_AMNT , AA.PYYT_TXTN_TOT_AMNT , AA.PYYT_FREE_DTY_TOT_AMNT , AA.PYYT_DDUC_TOT_AMNT , AA.PYYT_TX_TOT_AMNT , AA.PYYT_SEVE_PAY_PYMT_YN , AA.PYYT_PERN_PYMT_SUM , AA.KYBDR , AA.INPT_DT , AA.INPT_ADDR , AA.ISMT , AA.REVN_DT , AA.REVN_ADDR , (SELECT NVL(SUM(DD.PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 DD WHERE AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH = DD.PYYT_YR_MNTH AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = DD.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD = DD.DPOB_CD AND DD.PYYT_ITEM_CD = 'B0010100')AS PYYT_B10100_SUM , (SELECT NVL(SUM(DD.PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 DD WHERE AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH = DD.PYYT_YR_MNTH AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = DD.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD = DD.DPOB_CD AND DD.PYYT_ITEM_CD = 'T0010100')AS PYYT_T10100_SUM , (SELECT NVL(SUM(DD.PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM), 0) FROM PYYT0302 DD WHERE AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH = DD.PYYT_YR_MNTH AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = DD.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD = DD.DPOB_CD AND DD.PYYT_ITEM_CD = 'T0020100')AS PYYT_T20100_SUM FROM PYYT0304 AA WHERE 1=1
AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#
AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD , C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , C.TYP_OCCU_CD , C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' ))) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = AA.DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(AA.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
AA.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
AA.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
ORDER BY AA.SYSTEMKEY DESC , AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH DESC , AA.DPOB_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

C.DEPT_CD

)

PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth#
) CC01, (SELECT AA01.ROWNM, AA01.DPOB_CD, AA01.PYYT_ITEM_CD AS PYYT_ITEM_CD01, AA01.PAY_ITEM_NM AS PAY_ITEM_NM01 FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNM, DPOB_CD, PYYT_ITEM_CD, PAY_ITEM_NM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD, PYYT_ITEM_CD, PAY_ITEM_NM FROM (SELECT DPOB_CD, (PAY_EXTPY_CD) AS PYYT_ITEM_CD, (PAY_EXTPY_NM) AS PAY_ITEM_NM FROM PAYR0480 UNION ALL SELECT DPOB_CD, PAY_DDUC_CD, PAY_DDUC_NM FROM PAYR0470 ) ORDER BY PYYT_ITEM_CD ASC)) AA01) CC02 WHERE CC01.DPOB_CD = CC02.DPOB_CD ORDER BY ROWNM ASC ) AA , (SELECT DPOB_CD , PYYT_YR_MNTH , SYSTEMKEY , PYYT_ITEM_CD , PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD , SUM(PYYT_PYDD_FREE_DTY_SUM) AS PYYT_PYDD_FREE_DTY_SUM , SUM(PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM) AS PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth#
GROUP BY DPOB_CD , PYYT_YR_MNTH , SYSTEMKEY , PYYT_ITEM_CD , PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_CD ) BB, ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD, AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH, AA.SYSTEMKEY, AA.HAN_NM , AA.RESN_REGN_NUM, AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD, AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD, AA.DEPT_CD, AA.BUSIN_CD, AA.TYP_OCCU_CD FROM PYYT0304 AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth#
AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' ))) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = AA.DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(AA.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
AA.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
AA.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
AA.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
) CC WHERE AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYYT_YR_MNTH AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH = CC.PYYT_YR_MNTH AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD GROUP BY AA.ROWNM , CC.DPOB_CD , AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH , CC.DEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , CC.HAN_NM , CC.RESN_REGN_NUM , AA.PAY_ITEM_NM01 ) A1, ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD, AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH, AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD, AA.DEPT_CD, AA.SYSTEMKEY, COUNT(AA.SYSTEMKEY) AS DEPT_CNT, SUM(AA.PYYT_PYMT_TOT_AMNT) AS PYYT_PYMT_TOT_AMNT, SUM(AA.PYYT_DDUC_TOT_AMNT) AS PYYT_DDUC_TOT_AMNT, SUM(AA.PYYT_PERN_PYMT_SUM) AS PYYT_PERN_PYMT_SUM FROM PYYT0304 AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH = #pyytYrMnth#
AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#

C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)

#typOccuCdArr[]#
